definitions.definition: Straying from the proper course or standard , or outside established limits .
Prone to err or making errors ; misbehaving .
examples: We ran down the street in pursuit of the errant dog.

definitions.definition: Obsolete form of arrant ( “ complete; downright, utter ” ) .
definitions.label_groups: chiefly with a negative connotation , obsolete

main_definition: Straying from the proper course or standard , or outside established limits .
secondary_definitions: Prone to err or making errors ; misbehaving .
( chiefly with a negative connotation , obsolete ) Obsolete form of arrant ( “ complete; downright, utter ” ) .
